dataPortalMessage: Important: To make the experiment work, please request your data in JSON format.

intro.title: Facebook
intro.dataPortalMessage: Important: To make the experiment work, please request your data in JSON format.

off-facebook-activity-count.title: Off Facebook activity ranking
off-facebook-activity-count.text: See how many times third parties have informed Facebook of your activity outside of Facebook.

off-facebook-activity-type-count.title: Off Facebook activity type
off-facebook-activity-type-count.text: See which kind of information advertisers have shared with Facebook of your activity outside of Facebook.

ad-interactions.title: Ad interactions
ad-interactions.text: See the list of ads with which you have interacted.

your-topics.title: Inferred interests
your-topics.text: Get a list of topics that Facebook thinks you're interested in.

advertisers-contact-list.title: Contact list
advertisers-contact-list.text: Get a list of advertisers that have uploaded a contact list containing you.

custom-audiences.title: Advertisers using your data
custom-audiences.text: See all advertisers that use Facebook to get information about you

genericDateViewer.name: Timeline
genericDateViewer.title: Timeline
genericDateViewer.text: See all the dated events in your files, corresponding to data that has been collected on you at or concerning a specific date.
genericDateViewer.graphTitle: Number of dated events in your files
genericDateViewer.graphNoDate: No dated events were found in your file(s).
genericDateViewer.datedEvents: From {currMinDate} to {currMaxDate} we found {total} dated events in your file(s).

genericLocationViewer.name: Location Observations
genericLocationViewer.title: Location Observations
genericLocationViewer.text: See all the location events in your files, corresponding to data that has been collected on you at or concerning a specific location.
genericLocationViewer.graphTitle: Number of location records in your files
genericLocationViewer.graphNoLocation: No location were found in your file(s).
genericLocationViewer.locations: We found {total} locations in your file(s).

intro.title: Facebook
intro.dataPortalMessage: Important: Pour que l'expérience fonctionne, veuillez demander vos données au format JSON.

off-facebook-activity-count.title: Classement des activités hors Facebook
off-facebook-activity-count.text: Statistiques de tierces parties qui informent Facebook de vos activités en dehors de Facebook.

off-facebook-activity-type-count.title: Types d'activités hors Facebook
off-facebook-activity-type-count.text: Type d'information que les publicitaires partagent avec Facebook sur vos activités en dehors de Facebook.

ad-interactions.title: Interactions avec des publicités
ad-interactions.text: Liste des publicités avec lesquels vous avez interagi.

your-topics.title: Intérêts supposés
your-topics.text: Liste de sujets dont Facebook pense qu'ils vous intéressent.

advertisers-contact-list.title: Liste de contacts
advertisers-contact-list.text: Liste de publicitaires qui ont partagé une liste de contacts qui vous mentionne.

custom-audiences.title: Publicitaire utilisant vos données
custom-audiences.text: Liste des publicitaires qui utilisent Facebook pour obtenir des informations qui vous concernent.

genericDateViewer.name: Chronologie
genericDateViewer.title: Chronologie
genericDateViewer.text: Voir tous les événements datés dans vos dossiers, correspondant aux données qui ont été collectées sur vous à ou concernant une date spécifique.
genericDateViewer.graphTitle: Nombre d'événements datés dans vos dossiers
genericDateViewer.graphNoDate: Aucun événement daté n'a été trouvé dans votre (vos) dossier(s).
genericDateViewer.datedEvents: De {currMinDate} à {currMaxDate} nous avons trouvé {total} événements datés dans votre (vos) fichier(s).

genericLocationViewer.name: Positions
genericLocationViewer.title: Observations de localisation
genericLocationViewer.text: Voir tous les événements de localisation dans vos fichiers, correspondant aux données qui ont été collectées sur vous à ou concernant un lieu spécifique.
genericLocationViewer.graphTitle: Nombre de localisation dans vos fichiers
genericLocationViewer.graphNoLocation: Aucune localisation n'a été trouvé dans votre/vos fichier(s).
genericLocationViewer.locations: Nous avons trouvé {total} observations de localisation dans votre/vos fichier(s).

title: Facebook

viewBlocks.sql: SELECT name AS advertiserName, o.timestamp AS date_, COUNT(*) AS count_ FROM OffFacebookActivityEvent o GROUP BY name, o.timestamp;
viewBlocks.title: Off Facebook activity ranking
viewBlocks.text: See how many times third parties have informed Facebook of your activity outside of Facebook.

viewBlocks.sql: SELECT name AS targetingType, type AS targetingValue, COUNT(*) AS count_ FROM OffFacebookActivityEvent WHERE targetingType IN ( SELECT name FROM OffFacebookActivityEvent GROUP BY name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10 ) GROUP BY targetingType, targetingValue
viewBlocks.title: Off Facebook activity type
viewBlocks.text: See which kind of information advertisers have shared with Facebook of your activity outside of Facebook.

viewBlocks.sql: SELECT title, a.action, a.timestamp FROM AdvertiserInteraction a GROUP BY title, a.timestamp;
viewBlocks.title: Ad interactions
viewBlocks.text: See the list of ads with which you have interacted.

viewBlocks.title: Inferred interests
viewBlocks.text: Get a list of topics that Facebook thinks you're interested in.

viewBlocks.title: Contact list
viewBlocks.text: Get a list of advertisers that have uploaded a contact list containing you.

viewBlocks.title: Advertisers using your data
viewBlocks.text: See all advertisers that use Facebook to get information about you

viewBlocks.title: Timeline
viewBlocks.text: See all the dated events in your files, corresponding to data that has been collected on you at or concerning a specific date.

viewBlocks.title: Location observations
viewBlocks.text: See all the location events in your files, corresponding to data that has been collected on you at or concerning a specific location.
